text: This information may be able to help you. <https://caniuse.email/>
anyone have issues with email preview link redirecting to homepage?
Page selector (page and blog post) doesnt show the main blog listing page when looking for a page/post

Also, interesting thing I was able to:
- add in a flexible column to the blog post template (when doing a coded template)
- Add a widget
- I cannot remove the widget

I know this isnt fully supported and you shouldnt be able to add a flexible column to a blog post template just thought I would share this in case others come across it as well
When you see the end result, you will understand all my crazy commenting and what I am doing lol :smiling_imp:
i like the back to Repeater index being at the bottom, but the link is overlaping the save and and to module list button

On this link, I can see we can't use the custom font on email templates.
I want to use "Muli" font on my email template. How can I solve this?
